snippet.title: Just Cause 4: Dare Devils of Destruction [ESRB]
snippet.description:
🔥 Just Cause 4 Dare Devils of Destruction DLC 🔥 

🥇Early Access for Gold Edition/Expansion Pass Owners begins:
9am PDT 23rd April

🌍Everyone else:
9am PDT 30th April

💡More Info:
https://sqex.link/JC4-Dare-Devils

Rico Rodriguez gears up for an adrenaline fuelled adventure in Dare Devils of Destruction. 
Drive one of many weaponized vehicles as you take on rival gangs across three explosive challenges. Burn rubber and shred metal in this celebration of violent vehicular mayhem.
Destroy. Drive. Survive.

Just Cause 4 is available NOW on Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC (Steam). Buy here: https://justcause.square-enix-games.com/en-us/buy-now

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Be sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel for further updates on Just Cause 4: http://sqex.link/JCSubscribe

https://JustCause.com

Twitch: https://sqex.link/JCTwitch

Instagram: https://sqex.link/JCInstagram

Twitter: https://sqex.link/JCTwitter

Facebook: https://sqex.link/JCFacebook

Discord: https://sqex.link/JCDiscord

Reddit: https://sqex.link/JCReddit
